What's the deal with Leaflet?

Our first workshop is going to be all about Leaflet, the popular javascript mapping library.

Never used Leaflet or written javascript before? No problem. Chris Brown will be leading a beginner-friendly intro to building webmaps. Come make some sweet maps with us!

Reminder: maptime is hands-on, so bring a laptop. We’ll send more specifics out as we get closer to the meetup.

Join us: Monday, Sep 29 2014
RSVP
Posted Sep 24 2014

It's Maptime, Philly!

Hey Philly! It’s maptime! And we even have a website! How about that?

Maptime is for anyone who loves maps and wants to learn more about them. Every month we come together to hack maps, delve into the world of geospatial data, and learn about the latest cartographic tools in an extremely beginner-friendly environment. Maptime is hands-on, so bring your laptops and get ready to help build some cool stuff with an inclusive community of map nerds. All skill levels are welcome!

For more on Maptime and the general ethos, check out maptime.io.

Posted Sep 18 2014
